content.html: “Hi Tim, we’re looking for an URGENT hire as an X engineer. Just send over a resume, take these tests, pass all 27 interviews and in 6 months you could be working here.” “Tim, what would you say your biggest strength is?” “I know the definition of the word “urgent”?” 🤷‍♂️
content.value:
“Hi Tim, we’re looking for an URGENT hire as an X engineer. Just send over a resume, take these tests, pass all 27 interviews and in 6 months you could be working here.”

“Tim, what would you say your biggest strength is?”

“I know the definition of the word “urgent”?” 🤷‍♂️
